titles.title: Jesus is Lord, Jesus is King

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The winds of change
Will sweep the earth
Jesus will be coming soon again
Every knee will bow,
Every tongue confess:

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
// Jesus is Lord, Jesus is King
Hellelujah
Jesus is Lord, Jesus is King //
Hallelujah/

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Soon the trumpets
Will raise a sound
Nations will be coming
Before our King
In worship and praise,
We will dance and sing:
